header_text: While collaborating on a project at work, you tell your ideas to your group. The other members of the group don't react. They must be thinking about the project.

elements.Text: Do the members of the group think your ideas are bad?

elements.name: While collaborating on a project at work, you tell your ideas to your group. The other members of the group don't react. They must be thinking about the project._Work/Career Development_comp_question
